mapper.update: update tbl_teacher_subject set tid = #{tid}, subno = #{subno} where tsno = #{tsno}
mapper.select: select p.tsno, p.subname, p.subgrade, t.tname from tbl_teacher t,( select s.subname, s.subgrade, ts.tid, ts.tsno from tbl_subject s, ( select subno, tid, tsno from tbl_teacher_subject)ts where ts.subno = s.subno) p where t.tid = p.tid

select p.subname, p.subgrade, t.tname, tsno from tbl_teacher t,( select s.subname, s.subgrade, ts.tid, tsno from tbl_subject s, ( select subno, tid, tsno from tbl_teacher_subject where tsno in ( select tsno from tbl_curriculum where pno = #{pno}))ts where ts.subno = s.subno) p where t.tid = p.tid
